description: This file defines Pydantic models related to content entities, including creation, update, reading, and listing responses within a content management API.

classes.name: ContentBase
classes.description: Shared content fields including the title.

classes.name: ContentCreate
classes.description: Payload model for creating new content, inherits from ContentBase.

classes.name: ContentUpdate
classes.description: Payload model for updating existing content.

classes.name: ContentRead
classes.description: Model representing content data when read, including identifier and timestamps.

classes.name: ContentListResponse
classes.description: Response envelope for listing multiple content items.
